What should I do if I encounter a fire?: If you encounter a fire, you should immediately call 000 for emergency assistance.
What should I do if I want to prevent fi: To prevent fire, you should check weather and drought conditions, choose an open location for a campfire, ensure the campfire is completely extinguished, keep vehicles off dry grass, never leave a campfire unattended, not throw cigarettes or other smoking materials on the ground, keep sparks away from dry vegetation, and call 000 for any emergency.
